chdsw.philips.com.haraldlib

Interface HBDeviceListener


  • public interface HBDeviceListener
    Interface between HBCentral and a HBDevice.

    The HBDevice sends status updates to HBCentral.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connected(HBDevice hbDevice)
      HBDevice has successfully connected.
      void connectFailed(HBDevice hbDevice)
      Connecting with HBDevice has failed.
      void disconnected(HBDevice hbDevice)
      HBDevice has disconnected.
      void onReadWriteError(HBDevice hbDevice)
      Read/write request failed on HBDevice.

    • Method Detail

      • connected

        void connected(HBDevice hbDevice)
        HBDevice has successfully connected.
        Parameters:
        hbDevice - HBDevice that connected.

      • connectFailed

        void connectFailed(HBDevice hbDevice)
        Connecting with HBDevice has failed.
        Parameters:
        hbDevice - HBDevice of which connect failed.

      • disconnected

        void disconnected(HBDevice hbDevice)
        HBDevice has disconnected.
        Parameters:
        hbDevice - HBDevice that disconnected.

      • onReadWriteError

        void onReadWriteError(HBDevice hbDevice)
        Read/write request failed on HBDevice.
        Parameters:
        hbDevice - HBDevice of which read/write failed.
